attributes.action: Make it law that car head lights are on all the time when driving between September and March
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see it law like most of europe that car headlights need to be on all the time during the less visable months between september and march. In the interest of safty I know so many people that have had close encounters due to lack of visability at the said time of year.
